summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plat 12E, Page 56 of the Official Zoning of The City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Tracts 24, 25, 26, 27 and 28 of Ballard Acre Tracts from RS 5000 to RD 5000, and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (C.F. 286728, Petition of Richard J. Shavey, agent).
